content: Hi, how much does the Rust portion of the compiler (before LLVM IR) change depending on opt levels? Is it mostly to pass to LLVM?

Thin local LTO is enabled when optimizations are enabled. Some more MIR optimizations are enabled (mir opt level 2 instead of 1) I believe it has some effect on cgu partitioning, but I am not sure about that. I might have missed a couple of things.
Zhi Jun Cheung has marked this topic as resolved.
